Soluvit.description_en:
ğŸ’‰ Soluvit (Soluvit): Yellow lyophilized powder (water-soluble vitamins) for intravenous injection, containing thiamine, riboflavin, niacinamide, pyridoxine, folic acid, cyanocobalamin, biotin, sodium pantothenate, and ascorbic acid. Used to supply daily needs of water-soluble vitamins in intravenous (parenteral) nutrition for adults and children. Added to intravenous nutrition mixture in patients with malnutrition, heavy surgeries, or gastrointestinal failure who cannot absorb vitamins from food. 
 Manufacturer: Fresenius Kabi, global pharmaceutical and medical equipment company based in Bad Homburg, Germany. 
 Each box contains ten vials.

prolia.description_en:
Prolia 60 mg (Denosumab): Pre-filled syringe injection (Amgen) for treating osteoporosis in postmenopausal women at high risk of fracture, men with osteoporosis or receiving hormone therapy for prostate cancer, and reducing bone complications in patients with multiple myeloma or cancer with bone metastases. By inhibiting RANKL, it reduces bone resorption and increases bone density. 
 Application: Prevention of fractures due to osteoporosis and management of bone complications in cancer. Dose: 60 mg subcutaneous every 6 months, with calcium and vitamin D. 
 Manufacturer: Amgen, USA.

Pethidine.description_en:
Pethidine injectable 100 mg/2 ml (Brand M): Opioid ampule for relieving moderate to severe pain (such as post-surgery pain, labor, or acute pain). Used for auxiliary anesthesia, labor pain relief, and pre-operative relief (premedication). Administered via subcutaneous, intramuscular, or slow intravenous injection (IV) with a dose of 25-100 mg every 4 hours (maximum 400 mg in 24 hours). It reduces pain by inhibiting opioid receptors and has a sedative effect. 
 Manufacturer: Martindale Pharma, UK 
 Each box contains ten Pethidine injectable 100 mg/2 ml

sinatropin10.description_en: ğŸ’‰ Sinatropin Somatropin is a synthetic injectable growth hormone. Used for treating growth hormone deficiency in children (causing short stature) and adults, diseases like Turner syndrome (genetic disorder in women), chronic kidney failure, or Prader-Willi syndrome (genetic disorder with obesity and growth issues). Sometimes prescribed for increasing muscle mass in specific conditions. Consume under medical supervision.

biotine.description_en:
ğŸŒ¿ Biotin Bayer ampule (Biotin Bayer): Injectable ampule containing 5 mg biotin (vitamin B7) per 1 ml vial. Used for strengthening hair, nails, and skin. Helps reduce hair loss, increase hair shaft thickness, and improve follicle health. Also used for treating biotin deficiency, nail brittleness, and skin issues (like dermatitis). 
 Manufacturer: Bayer, Germany. 
 Each box contains 6 injectable biotin ampules

gardasil9s.description_en:
ğŸ’‰ Gardasil 9 MSD: Recombinant 9-valent human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine for preventing cervical, vaginal, vulvar, anal, head and neck cancers (like oropharyngeal), and genital warts in women and men aged 9 to 45. Protects against HPV types 6, 11, 16, 18, 31, 33, 45, 52, 58. 
 Application: Prevention of HPV-related cancers and precancerous lesions. Intramuscular injection (IM) in deltoid or anterolateral thigh, 2-dose schedule (6-12 months interval) for 9-14 years, or 3-dose (0, 2, 6 months) for 15-45 years. 
 Manufacturer: Merck Sharp & Dohme B.V. (MSD), subsidiary of Merck & Co., Inc.

ZakAria.description_en:
ğŸ©º Zak-Aria (Pembrolizumab) 100 mg/4 ml (25 mg/ml): Immunotherapy drug (anti-PD-1 monoclonal antibody) for treating advanced cancers like melanoma, non-small cell lung cancer, head and neck cancer, Hodgkin lymphoma, stomach cancer, and metastatic tumors with specific genetic defects (like microsatellite instability). By blocking PD-1, it activates the immune system to attack cancer cells. 
 Application: Treatment of metastatic cancers and improving patient survival. Intravenous injection every 3-6 weeks, under physician supervision. 
 Manufacturer: CinnaGen, Iran. 
 Each box contains 1 injectable vial.

VinblastineBas.description_en:
ğŸ©º Vinblastine sulfate injectable (BASTYRA-10 10mg/10ml): Chemotherapy drug from the vinca alkaloids group for treating cancers like Hodgkin lymphoma, non-Hodgkin lymphoma, non-small cell lung cancer, breast cancer, testicular cancer, melanoma, and Wilms tumor. By inhibiting microtubule formation, it stops cell division in metaphase and slows cancer cell growth. 
 Application: Treatment of various cancers, usuallyin combination chemotherapy regimens, intravenous injection under physician supervision. 
 Manufacturer: Medyra Pharmaceutical, Iran.

VinblastineUni.description_en:
ğŸ©º Vinblastine sulfate injectable (BASTYRA-10 10mg/10ml): Chemotherapy drug from the vinca alkaloids group for treating cancers like Hodgkin lymphoma, non-Hodgkin lymphoma, non-small cell lung cancer, breast cancer, testicular cancer, melanoma, and Wilms tumor. By inhibiting microtubule formation, it stops cell division in metaphase and slows cancer cell growth. 
 Application: Treatment of various cancers, usually in combination chemotherapy regimens, intravenous injection under physician supervision. 
 Manufacturer: Medyra Pharmaceutical, Iran.

Hydroxyurea.description_en:
ğŸ©º Hydroxyurea Madac 500 mg (Hydroxyurea madac 500mg capsules): Anticancer capsule (antineoplastic) and antimetabolite used for treating chronic myeloid leukemia (CML), head and neck cancer (advanced squamous cell, with radiotherapy), and sickle cell anemia. In cancer, by inhibiting ribonucleotide reductase enzyme, it disrupts DNA synthesis and stops cancer cell growth. In sickle cell anemia, it increases fetal hemoglobin (HbF), improves red blood cell deformability, and reduces painful attacks (vaso-occlusive crises) and blood transfusion needs. 
 Manufacturer: medac Pharma LLP, Germany. 
 Each box contains 100 hydroxyurea capsules

Dexametazone.description_en:
ğŸ’‰ Dexamethasone 8 mg/2 ml (Alborz): Corticosteroid injectable ampule (10 ampules of 2 ml) for reducing inflammation and suppressing the immune system. Used for treating inflammatory diseases (arthritis, lupus), severe allergies, asthma, cerebral edema, shock, and autoimmune diseases (like ulcerative colitis). Also used in treating chemotherapy-induced nausea and severe COVID-19 (requiring oxygen). Works by inhibiting inflammatory cytokines.
 Manufacturer: Alborz Pharmaceutical, Iran.

Mestinon.description_en:
Mestinon 60 mg (Pyridostigmine Bromide): Oral tablet (200-count, Mylan) for treating muscle weakness in myasthenia gravis, an autoimmune disease causing progressive muscle weakness and fatigue. By inhibiting acetylcholinesterase enzyme, it increases acetylcholine levels and improves nerve signal transmission to muscles. Also used to reverse non-depolarizing muscle relaxants effects (like in surgery) and sometimes to prevent nerve gas effects (in military conditions). 
 Manufacturer: Mylan, subsidiary of Viatris, USA.

ğŸ’Š Rukin (Drospirenone/Ethinylestradiol): Combination contraceptive tablet (each tablet: 3 mg drospirenone and 0.03 mg ethinylestradiol). yasmin.description_en:
ğŸ’Š Yasmin 3 mg/30 mcg (21-count, Bayer brand): Combination contraceptive tablet containing 3 mg drospirenone (progestin) and 30 mcg ethinylestradiol (estrogen). Used for preventing pregnancy, regulating menstruation, reducing menstrual pain, and improving moderate acne in women. Works by inhibiting ovulation, thickening cervical mucus, and thinning the endometrium. 
 Manufacturer: Bayer AG, Germany.

Rogam300.description_en:
ğŸ’‰ RhoGAM (Immunorho 300 mcg): Injectable ampule containing human anti-Rh(D) immunoglobulin, for preventing Rh incompatibility in pregnancy. In Rh-negative (Rh-) mothers with Rh-positive (Rh+) fetus, it prevents antibody production against fetal red blood cells to avoid hemolytic disease of the newborn (red blood cell destruction) in subsequent pregnancies.
 Manufacturer: Kedrion Biopharma, Italy. 
 Each box contains one injectable ampule pen
